remarks: Define a free monoid over a set ` i ` of generators, defined as the set of finite strings on ` I ` with the operation of concatenation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)
statement: df-frmd $p |- freeMnd = ( i e. _V |-> { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , Word i >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , ( ++ |` ( Word i X. Word i ) ) >. } ) $.
